metadata.title: CVE-2023-37209 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A use-after-free condition existed in `NotifyOnHistoryReload` where a `LoadingSessionHistoryEntry` object was freed and a reference to that object remained. This resulted in a potentially exploitable condition when the reference to that object was later reused. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 115.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 22.04, the firefox package is just a script that installs the Firefox snap

criterions.comment: firefox package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
